pr_title: HDDS-4196. Add an endpoint in Recon to query Prometheus

timeline.message: HDDS-4196. Add an endpoint in Recon to query Prometheus
Fix rat and integration test failure

timeline.bodyText:
Nit. can be StringUtils.isEmpty(prometheusEndpoint)
Nit. Let's add a log line saying we are choosing "Prometheus" as the configured Metrics provider here or inside the constructor of PrometheusServiceProviderImpl.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: Nit. These constants can go inside PrometheusServiceProviderImpl.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: Nit. getEndpointConfigKey() can be a method on the MetricsServiceProvider interface.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: @avijayanhwx I thought about keeping this method as part of the interface. But, then to construct this error message, we will have to instantiate PrometheusServiceProviderImpl to get endpoint config key. This is because, metricsServiceProviderFactory.getMetricsServiceProvider() will return null when no metrics service providers are configured.
replies.author: vivekratnavel

timeline.bodyText: We should do values.addAll() or Collections. unmodifiableMap() here, since the caller may mutate the passed in reference.
